summary.span: 封装文本布局信息（如对齐方式、方向和制表位）、显示操作（如省略号插入和区域数字替换）和 OpenType 功能。

span.span: Encapsulates text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 设置制表位的。Sets the tab stops of the . - 绘制的字符串和布局矩形。Draws the string and the layout rectangle. 请注意，该字符串包含选项卡。Note that the string contains tabs. 选项卡设置指定制表符分隔文本的偏移量。The tab settings of the specify the offsets of the tabbed text. - 获取的制表位和使用，或检查这些值。Gets the tab stops and uses or inspects the values. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在图形用户界面中，热密钥是在 word 中 （通常与另一个键，如 Alt 键相结合） 带下划线的字母，可以按键盘上激活一词表示的功能。In a graphical user interface, a hot key is the underlined letter in a word (usually combined with another key, such as the Alt key) that you can press on the keyboard to activate the functionality that the word represents. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置键盘快捷方式使用属性。The following code example shows how to set a keyboard shortcut using the property. 它还演示了如何使用方法。It also demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例中，将代码粘贴到窗体中，处理该窗体事件，并调用以下方法，传递 e 作为。To run this example, paste the code into a form, handle the form's event and call the following method, passing e as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

public: void SetDigitSubstitution(int language, System::Drawing::StringDigitSubstitute substitute);

param.name: language
param.span: 一个区域语言支持 (NLS) 语言标识符，它标识在将本地数字替换为西方数字时所使用的语言。

span.span: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.

param.span: 可将 对象的 属性作为 NLS 语言标识符传递。

span.span: You can pass the property of a object as the NLS language identifier.

param.span: 例如，假定通过将字符串“ar-EG”传递给 构造函数来创建 对象。

span.span: For example, suppose you create a object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a constructor.

param.span: 如果将该 对象的 属性连同 一起传递给 ，则在显示时阿拉伯 - 印度文数字将会替换西方数字。

span.span: If you pass the property of that object along with to the method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.

param.name: substitute
param.span: 枚举的一个元素，它指定如何显示数字位。

span.span: An element of the enumeration that specifies how digits are displayed.

summary.span: 指定将本地数字替换为西方数字时所使用的语言和方法。

span.span: Specifies the language and method to be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 集，为，要使用的语言和要使用的替换方法。Sets, for the , the language to be used and the substitution method to be used. - 绘制的字符串。Draws the string. - 针对两个不同的语言 （阿拉伯语和泰语） 重复上述两个步骤。Repeats the above two steps for two different languages (Arabic and Thai). 两种语言的每个演示国家/地区的替换方法和传统的替换方法。The National substitution method and Traditional substitution method are demonstrated for each of the two languages. 国家/地区方法显示根据用户的区域设置的正式国家/地区语言的数字。The National method displays digits according to the official national language of the user's locale. 传统方法显示根据用户的本机脚本或语言，这可能与正式国家/地区语言不同的数字。The Traditional method displays digits according to the user's native script or language, which may be different from the official national language. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetMeasurableCharacterRanges(valuetype System.Drawing.CharacterRange[] ranges) cil managed

param.name: ranges
param.span: 结构的数组，这些结构指定由调用 方法来测定的字符范围。

span.span: An array of structures that specifies the ranges of characters measured by a call to the method.

summary.span: 指定 结构的数组，这些结构表示通过调用 方法来测定的字符的范围。

span.span: Specifies an array of structures that represent the ranges of characters measured by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置超过 32 个字符的范围不允许，将导致。Setting more than 32 character ranges is not allowed and will cause an . ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 设置的字符范围。Sets the character ranges of the . - 测量给定字符串和布局矩形的字符范围。Measures the character ranges for a given string and layout rectangle. - 绘制字符串和布局矩形。Draws the string and layout rectangle. - 绘制区域。Paints the regions. 每个指定一系列字符占用的区域。Each specifies an area that is occupied by a range of characters. 在区域中的值设置时的字符范围的衡量方法。The values in the regions are set when the character ranges are measured by the method. - 重复前四个步骤，但包括中的每个字符范围测量值的尾随空格。Repeats the first four steps, but includes trailing spaces in the measurement of each character range. - 清除所用的格式标志，以便每个字符范围的测量值中不包括尾随空格。Clears the format flags of the so that trailing spaces are not included in the measurement of each character range. - 重复前四个步骤，但使用不同的布局矩形只是为了演示布局矩形会影响的度量值的字符范围。Repeats the first four steps, but uses a different layout rectangle just to demonstrate that the layout rectangle affects the measurements of the character ranges. 字体的大小也会影响度量值。The size of the font will also affect the measurement. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 已设置超过 32 个字符范围。

span.span: More than 32 character ranges are set.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetTabStops (float firstTabOffset, float[] tabStops);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetTabStops(float32 firstTabOffset, float32[] tabStops) cil managed
Public Sub SetTabStops (firstTabOffset As Single, tabStops As Single())
public: void SetTabStops(float firstTabOffset, cli::array <float> ^ tabStops);

param.name: firstTabOffset
param.span: 文本行开头和第一个制表位之间的空格数。

span.span: The number of spaces between the beginning of a line of text and the first tab stop.

param.name: tabStops
param.span: 制表位之间的距离的数组，这些距离的单位由 属性指定。

span.span: An array of distances between tab stops in the units specified by the property.

summary.span: 为此 对象设置制表位。

span.span: Sets tab stops for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个制表位偏移量`tabStops`数组，除第一个是相对于前一个。Each tab-stop offset in the `tabStops` array, except the first one, is relative to the previous one. 第一个制表位偏移量是相对于指定的初始偏移量位置`firstTabOffset`。The first tab-stop offset is relative to the initial offset position specified by `firstTabOffset`. 例如，如果初始偏移量的位置是 8，第一个制表位偏移量为 50，则第一个制表位的位置是 58。For example, if the initial offset position is 8 and the first tab-stop offset is 50, then the first tab stop is at position 58. 如果初始偏移量的位置为零，第一个制表位偏移量是相对于位置 0，字符串源。If the initial offset position is zero, then the first tab-stop offset is relative to position 0, the string origin. ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 设置制表位的。Sets the tab stops of the . - 绘制的字符串和布局矩形。Draws the string and the layout rectangle. 请注意，该字符串包含选项卡。Note that the string contains tabs. 选项卡设置指定制表符分隔文本的偏移量。The tab settings of the specify the offsets of the tabbed text. - 获取的制表位和使用，或检查这些值。Gets the tab stops and uses or inspects the values. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 将此 对象转换为可读的字符串。

span.span: Converts this object to a human-readable string.

returns.span: 此 对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: A string representation of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值转换属性。Only the value of the property is converted. ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 将转换为字符串的对象。Converts a object to a string. - 绘制的字符串。Draws the string. - 更改中的某些属性对象。Changes some properties in the object. - 绘制的字符串。Draws the string. 该字符串将不同因为的属性对象已更改。The string will be different because the properties of the object have changed. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::StringTrimming Trimming { System::Drawing::StringTrimming get(); void set(System::Drawing::StringTrimming value); };
member this.Trimming : System.Drawing.StringTrimming with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 对象的 枚举。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration for this object.

value.span: 枚举，它指示当用此 对象绘制的文本超出布局矩形的边缘时被剪裁的方式。

span.span: A enumeration that indicates how text drawn with this object is trimmed when it exceeds the edges of the layout rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以及如何使用枚举。The following example shows how to set the property and how to use the enumeration. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 将此代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowStringTrimming`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递 e 作为。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowStringTrimming` method when handling the form's event, passing e as .
